events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category due to customer's request for money back.
An available agent from the refund team has been assigned to this customer case for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you received the wrong item, and Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Here is the photo of the wrong product I got, and my order number is 123456. I really need this sorted quickly as I was relying on that item.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid label for the return of the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and for offering a refund. I appreciate the help and will send back the incorrect item as soon as I get the label.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label was sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and returned the incorrect item. Please reach out if everything is not yet resolved.
We are closing this case now as the refund process is complete and there are no further issues reported.
